jd: Greetings from iTech US Inc.! We have an urgent requirement for you and the details are as follows… Job Title: Business Analyst Location: Minneapolis Downtown MN (Day1 onsite) Duration: 6+ Months (Implementation/Prime Vendor Partner: TCS) Job Details:Need Strong profile on Business Analyst with 8+yrs IT exp. Job Description:Document business needs and features.Document As-Is and To-Be business processes.Facilitate User Story grooming sessions and create user stories.Identify and document business and technical requirements for various features.Conduct data analysis and data mapping on various features.Create and maintain a streamlined documentation for all the services effort. This includes content like: Design Documents, Business/System Process flows, Source Data Mapping, StoredProc used by API, Session log events, Test support documentation, etc.Document UAT Test Scenarios, conduct UAT testing and facilitate UAT Training sessions. Competencies: Business Analysis, Usability Analysis and Evaluation Techniques Kindly fill the below details as it is required while submitting it to the client:Full Name (Legal):Contact No:Alternate Contact No:E-mail ID:Work Authorization:Current Location:Former Employee of TCS (Yes/NO):Relocation (Y/N):LinkedIn URL:Education Details (Specialization/University/Passed out year)Bachelor's Degree:Master's Degree:
